attributes.action: Ensure that with no home nation qualifying for Euro ' 08. We have a football free summer!!.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With no home representation at the upcoming championships, we ask for the right to enjoy a summer in 2008, free from the medias'principle obsession.

It is rare that such a possibility exists, and surely it is time to let the other sports that normally occupy the summer months, and which resonate with the british public - every bit as much as football does - to have their time in the spotlight. Free from the, seemingly endless efforts, to relegate them behind a unstoppable monster!!.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
